Name: Sandstorm
Ingredients: 30 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Garnish with pineapple wedge on rim.
Review: A long, fruity cocktail featuring well-balanced sweet and sourness.
History: Created in 2003 by James Cunningham at Zinc in Glasgow, Scotland, and is named for its cloudy yellow colour.
Nutrition: One serving of Sandstorm contains 280 calories
